title: Miike Takashi’s ‘Sham,’ Rajkumar Periasamy’s ‘Amaran’ to Compete for Golden Peacock at India’s IFFI
summary: The 56th International Film Festival of India (IFFI) has unveiled its International Competition slate, featuring 15 feature films competing for the Golden Peacock award and total prize money of INR90 lakh ($101,500). The competition comprises 12 international titles and three Indian films, with an …

title: Sims streamers are distancing themselves from EA, but for some the choice is hard
summary: The Sims 4 community is in turmoil. Its biggest stars are distancing themselves from the game with the support of their millions of subscribers. Then there are creators in the middle: those big enough to be known, but not big enough to be insulated. And they are struggling with a difficult choice o…
